text: Christmas Present is the twenty-seventh studio album and the second Christmas album by American country music group The Statler Brothers. Released in 1985 via Mercury Records, it peaked at number 42 on the Billboard Top Country Albums chart. ==Track listing== #"Christmas Eve (Kodia's Theme)" (Don Reid, Harold Reid) – 3:16 #"Christmas Country Style" (Jimmy Fortune) – 2:00 #"Brahms' Bethlehem Lullaby" (Philip Balsley, Lew DeWitt, H.
